committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of a man of peace, Martin Luther King.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in honor of Martin Luther King.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of a man of peace, Martin Luther King.
